2020400.name: Rage Rabbit
2020400.description:
Rage Rabbit is a fast paced platform game set on an island haunted by mysterious shadows.
Shoot down your enemies, explore an interconnected world, defeat powerful bosses and obtain new power ups.

Game Features:

  • Fast paced shooting and platforming
  • Explore an open map full of secrets
  • Build up your RAGE by hitting enemies and release it at the right moment
  • Get stronger by finding powerful new abilities
  • Complete the special challenges to prove your skill
  • Customize your fighting style by trying different builds and weapons
  • Meet other adventurers and inhabitants of the island
  • Follow your instinct and free the island from its curse
  • Choose your own path
